filename.tooltip: This is the data file name. Katana will save the data file with this name.
filename.bantip: No spaces or special characters but for the exception of underscores, hyphens, and periods

file_desc.tooltip: This is the data file description.

sys_tag_name.tooltip: This is the system tag name.

sys_tag_value.tooltip: This is the system tag value.

sys_child_tag_name.tooltip: This is the system child tag name.

sys_child_tag_value.tooltip: This is the system child tag value.

subsys_tag_name.tooltip: This is the subsystem tag name.

subsys_tag_value.tooltip: This is the subsystem tag value.

edit_system.tooltip: Click this to edit this System.
edit_system.snowflake: You can edit only one system at a time

delete_system.tooltip: Click this to delete this System.
